Summary 13 years in networking and telecommunication domain.  
Specializing in Project management, Protocol testing, Service Provider solutions, SCRUM and Quality Assurance.  
 
•	Strategizing, estimating, planning & QA execution in complex multi-site projects and cross-functional teams 
•	Develop and manage project schedules, identify risks, problem solving and risk mitigation strategies 
•	Leading teams thru all phases of product life cycle 
•	Detailed understanding of integrated network performance management solutions 
•	Working with Product Management in drafting effective PRDs and user stories 
•	Detail technical know-how and product line proficiency 
•	QA processes and methodologies, test strategies and metrics 
•	Working with customers in US, Europe, Asia-PAC for resolving field issues, BETA tests and POCs 
•	Proven track record of successful product releases 
•	Experienced in building out and managing high performance QA teams, including hiring, performance assessment, driving QA efficiency, innovation & mentoring team members 
•	Experience in driving Agile projects as Scrum Master 
 
** Post Graduate Certificate in Business Management (PGCBM) - XLRI, Jamshedpur 
** Certified Scrum Master (CSM) - Scrum Alliance 
 
Technical expertise: 
•	Mobile technologies: GSM, LTE, CDMA, IMS 
•	Routing protocols: OSPF, BGP, EIGRP, RIP, Multicast protocols 
•	Layer-2 & Switching fundamentals, VLANs 
•	CCNP certified Summary 13 years in networking and telecommunication domain.
